profile_positions.description:
Process analysis & Implementation of improvement actions
Lead for the Implementation of Agile based master data system for customer service
Implementation of new Salesforce ecommerce system

SAP testing for CMS based changes

ISO Internal auditor responsibilities
profile_positions.title: IT Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Overview of tasks:
•	Supervision of 6 team-members, ensuring daily focus on KPI’s and excellence in Customer service
•	1st escalation point for evaluation and resolution of the issue.
•	Setting the target for the year ahead with the different team-members + evaluation of these 
 during the official reviews twice a year and through regular 1:1 meetings. 
•	Planning and execution of team-meetings, held twice a month
•	Supporting the sales-management team to achieve set KPI’s. 
•	Interviewing possible candidates for open positions within the team
•	Planning of social team-activities to support teambuilding
•	Servicing my own customer portfolio
Note: After my maternity leave (October 2010) I took part in a project to implement SAP in our outsourced Warehouse, which we completed successfully in April 2011. Within this team I was responsible for mapping the current processes and also create new processes that could be supported by SAP for the ‘outbound’ customer related services of our Warehouse.
Out of this several SixSigma and JDI project resulted which I participated.
I also was responsible for the introduction of new system settings to semi-automate the creation of EXA documents, applicable for customers with a HUB in the EU but an end destination outside the EU.
profile_positions.title: CS Teamleader

profile_positions.description:
Complete responsibility of all customer service aspects for the different European sites of a global focus account.
• Establishing and maintaining a good relationship with my main customer contacts in the different European plants, such as Hungary, Poland, Ukraine, France, Italy, Scotland, Austria and Belgium. 
• Management of whole ordering process from quote to order entry and ensuring timely delivery.
• Processing and follow up on any quality issues my customer may experienced and arranging replacement parts and ensuring the correct process of return orders, where applicable
• Regular communication with the different Molex factories to ensure timely delivery and for expedite, push out and cancelation purposes.
• Creation and follow up on quotes and applicable communication with the Asian and American price controller to ensure unity and that the part price is loaded globally if applicable.
• responsibility of maintaining a vendor owned inventory at 5 of the customer locations and in time VMI super user, which involved training other users and also working closely with IT to set up system support 
maintaining a stock-level, as accurate as possible.
• Regular contact with the different departments within the Molex Eindhoven site, such as Quality, Supply-chain, Finance, Marketing, Sales etc., to ensure above all a streamlined approach towards the customer.
profile_positions.title: European Account-manager

profile_positions.description:
Task Overview
•	Responsibility for a large number of smaller European customers 
•	Order processing, - maintenance and ensuring timely delivery through expedites, push-outs 
               or processing cancelations (if applicable).
•	Retour processing, (if applicable).
•	Processing of customer complaints and ensuring accurate communication between quality, 
               the customer and the factory to get the problem resolved asap.
profile_positions.title: Customer service representative

profile_positions.description:
Tasks overview:
•	Offer and order processing 
•	Follow up of manufacturing process with the in house factory
•	Creation of detailed technical product information and official publications and press 
               releases
•	organizing appointments for the sales department with existing customers
•	Technical helpdesk duty for the CADCAM department 
•	Support of our international agents in Japan, The UK, Germany, Switzerland and Austria.
•	Translation of customer related documents from Dutch to German and English.
•	Introduction of new products
•	Tradeshow planning and attendance
